trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 表示要顯示項目清單的 Windows 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項可讓您顯示給使用者，使用者可以按一下選取的項目清單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control can provide single or multiple selections using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項可以提供單一或多個選取項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A> property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>也提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>，啟用項目的資料行，而不是直接垂直清單中的項目顯示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item.
trans-unit.target: 與這個項目，此控制項可以顯示更明顯可見的項目，使用者不再需要捲動項目。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，Windows 控制代碼的繪圖中顯示的項目工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，並控制代碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件，因此您可以覆寫繪製 Windows 自動提供，並自行繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項以顯示在清單中的變動高度項目、 影像或不同的色彩或每個項目的文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> also help you draw your own items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A>也可協助您繪製您自己的項目。

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 除了顯示和選取的功能，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>也提供功能，可讓您有效率地將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>並找出清單的項目內的文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法可讓您新增的項目大量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不用每次重繪控制項項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您搜尋包含特定的搜尋字串的清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性提供的存取權由三個集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the three collections used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and their use within the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表概述所使用的三個集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和其控制項中的使用。

trans-unit.source: Collection class
trans-unit.target: 集合類別

trans-unit.target: 使用中 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Contains all items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含所包含的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合選取的項目，其中包含的項目子集在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 包含一組選取的索引，這是索引的子集的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引指定已選取項目。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class supports.
trans-unit.target: 下列三個範例顯示三個索引的集合，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>類別支援。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class enables you to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別可讓您將項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method can accept any object when adding a member to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>加入成員時，方法可以接受任何物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: When an object is being added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the control uses the text defined in the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當物件新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，此控制項會使用中定義的文字<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>物件的方法除非此物件內的成員名稱會指定於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In addition to adding items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class you can also add items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用加入項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您也可以新增項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>基底 Windows form 並想来修改這些控制項衍生的 Windows form 中的字串集合，基底的 Windows form 中的這些控制項的字串集合必須是空白。

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form.
trans-unit.target: 如果字串集合不是空的它們會變成唯讀時衍生另一個 Windows form。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The code for the example adds 50 items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class and then selects three items from the list using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例程式碼會加入到 50 個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> collection, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼會顯示的值從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>集合，到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>屬性，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>，到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is located in and called from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要是位於該程式碼，並從呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The code for the example adds 50 items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class and then selects three items from the list using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例程式碼會加入到 50 個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> collection, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼會顯示的值從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>集合，到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>屬性，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>，到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is located in and called from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要是位於該程式碼，並從呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This member is obsolete, and there is no replacement.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員已過時，而且沒有任何取代成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> currently enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 目前是否啟用清單項目的選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode.None" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode.None" /> 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The background image of the form.
trans-unit.target: 表單的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage" /> property of the label changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於標籤 (Label) 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> as defined in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 列舉型別中所定義的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 背景影像配置。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The values are <see langword="Center" />, <see langword="None" />, <see langword="Stretch" />, <see langword="Tile" />, or <see langword="Zoom" />.
trans-unit.target: 這些值為 <see langword="Center" />、<see langword="None" />、<see langword="Stretch" />、<see langword="Tile" /> 或 <see langword="Zoom" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Center" /> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Center" /> 為預設值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The specified enumeration value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的列舉值不存在。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance while items are added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 藉由在呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 方法之前防止繪製控制項，便可在每次將項目加入至 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate" /> 的同時維持效能。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 新增多個項目，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods while adding five thousand items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法時加入五千項目至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that is drawn around the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 周圍所繪製的框線類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取消選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法相當於設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>為負一 (-1) 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要快速地取消選取清單中的所有項目，您可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.TopIndex%2A> property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.TopIndex%2A>屬性，以將目前選取的項目移至的顯示區域中的項目清單的頂端<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, and how to clear all item selection using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ClearSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 進一步的範例將示範如何移除項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別，以及如何清除所有項目選取項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ClearSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code first moves the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to the top of the list.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼第一次將目前選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>到清單頂端。

trans-unit.source: The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼再移除目前選取的項目之前的所有項目，並清除所有選取項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包含的項目已加入至表單和中，項目目前已選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of columns in a multicolumn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定多資料行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的資料行寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of each column in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中每個資料行的寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將值設定為零 (0) 時，預設寬度被指派給每個資料行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns the current width of each column in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，這個屬性傳回的清單中的每個資料行的目前寬度。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> can properly display its items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，以確保每個資料行中的多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可正確顯示其項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a simple two-column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範簡單兩欄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: A value less than zero is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 將小於零的值指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目集合的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />，代表新的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: You can override this in your derived classes to provide a different collection to store your items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供不同的集合，用來儲存您的項目衍生類別中覆寫此程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the tabs between the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中各項目之間的定位點寬度。

trans-unit.source: A collection of integers representing the tab widths.
trans-unit.target: 整數的集合，表示定位點寬度。

trans-unit.source: The integer array contains the tab spaces in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 整數陣列 索引標籤中含有空格遞增的順序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default item height for an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的預設項目高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的視覺外觀變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，才引發的時機<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`或`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行繪製項目所需的工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有可變動大小的項目 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`)，繪製項目之前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要繪製的事件處理常式中的項目大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項稱為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要的項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> values representing the mode for drawing the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> 值，表示控制項項目的繪圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="DrawMode.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="DrawMode.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項稱為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要的項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> 列舉的成員。

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: 多資料行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的高度無法改變。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> control after painting is suspended by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate" /> 方法暫停繪製之後，繼續繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 將項目加入，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您一次加入清單的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每個項目新增至清單的時間。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作項目加入清單後，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>當正在大量項目加入至清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods while adding five thousand items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法時加入五千項目至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並放置在表單內和從它呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一個以指定字串為開頭的項目。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一個以指定字串為開頭的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 第一個找到項目之以零起始的索引，如果沒有相符的項目則傳回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找的文字部分符合指定的搜尋字串參數， `s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法提供的參數指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method to search for the first instance of a string in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法來搜尋字串中的第一個執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If no items are found that match the search string <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> returns a -1 value and the example displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有項目會找到符合的搜尋字串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>傳回-1 值和範例顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>。

trans-unit.source: If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method to select the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到符合搜尋文字項目，此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法，以選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="s" /> parameter is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 參數的值小於 -1，或者大於等於項目計數。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋第一個項目之前，項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 設為負一 (-1) 便可從控制項的開頭開始搜尋。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一個以指定字串為開頭的項目。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋作業將於指定起始索引處開始進行。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 第一個找到項目之以零起始的索引，如果沒有相符的項目則傳回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所執行的搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找的文字部分符合指定的搜尋字串參數， `s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的項目清單中指定的起始索引處的第一個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫使用這個方法不會指定起始索引版本之後，通常使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦在清單中找到的初始項目，這個方法通常用來進一步搜尋文字的執行個體指定尋找中的索引位置`startIndex`參數搜尋文字的第一個找到的執行個體後的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行精確的字詞相符而不是在部分符合的搜尋，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當搜尋到了底部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它會繼續從頂端搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>回所指定的項目`startIndex`參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法來搜尋的項目中的搜尋文字的所有執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用新版<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法可讓您指定要從中進行持續的所有項目中搜尋的開始搜尋索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates how to determine when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何判斷何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法開始之後的項目，以避免遞迴搜尋清單的底部，從清單的頂端搜尋。

trans-unit.source: Once items are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, they are selected using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一旦項目存在於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它們會選取使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 參數小於零，或者大於等於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一個與指定字串完全相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 尋找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一個與指定字串完全相符的項目。

trans-unit.target: 搜尋會尋找完全相符搜尋字串參數中指定的單字`s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來搜尋符合指定之字串的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以執行工作，例如移除包含使用的搜尋文字的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或變更項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦找到指定的文字，如果您想要搜尋的文字中的其他執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法提供的參數指定內的起始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要執行部分文字搜尋，而不是正確的字相符項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control for an item that exactly matches a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來搜尋<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>完全符合指定的字串的項目控制項。

trans-unit.source: If no items are found that match the search string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> returns a -1 value and the example displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有項目找不到符合搜尋字串，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>傳回-1 值和範例顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>。

trans-unit.source: If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method to select the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到符合搜尋文字項目，此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法，以選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method to search for all items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that exactly match the specified search text.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用新版<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法可讓您指定要從中進行持續的所有項目中搜尋的開始搜尋索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。
