trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 參數小於零，或者大於等於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項顯示之文字字型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至控制項顯示之文字的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to return the height for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回其高度的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中項目的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is not set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the index parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性未設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，因為在標準的所有項目，則會忽略索引參數的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大小都一樣。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，當您使用描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>來判斷任何項目內的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than the item count.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 參數的指定值小於零或大於項目計數。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of item whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 項目之以零起始的索引，您將要傳回該項目的週框。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle for an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中項目的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示特定項目的週框。

trans-unit.source: If the item specified in the `index` parameter is not visible, the rectangle returned by this method will be outside the visible portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的項目`index`看不到參數，這個方法所傳回的矩形將控制項的可見部分之外。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size and position of an item within the list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定的大小和位置的清單內的項目。

trans-unit.source: To get the height of an item, especially a variable-height owner drawn list item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的項目高度，特別是可變高度擁有者繪製的清單項目，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 參數小於零，或者大於等於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，指定要為其擷取顯示範圍的區域。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 控制項範圍的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定義控制項的大小和位置時所用的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 擷取縮放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示縮放控制項的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to ensure that the requested height is scaled rather than the current height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>類別覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以確保要求的高度為隨著調整，而不是目前的高度。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that determines whether it is selected.
trans-unit.target: 項目之以零起始的索引，可用來判斷該項目是否選取。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否選取指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified item is currently selected in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中選取指定的項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly determine whether a specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來快速判斷是否選取指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a specific operation needs to be performed when a specific item in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 需要多個選取項目中的特定項目時所要執行的特定作業時，此方法相當實用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>已選取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetSelected%2A> method to determine which items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetSelected%2A>方法來判斷哪些項目中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>都選取，才能選擇未選取的項目並取消選取 已選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property to enable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to have more than one selected item and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A> property to demonstrate how to sort items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性來啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>有多個選取項目，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>屬性來示範如何排序的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>自動。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>具名`listBox1`，已新增至表單，而且`InitializeMyListBox`範例中定義的方法從呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>表單的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 參數小於零，或者大於等於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 類別的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width by which the horizontal scroll bar of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 之水平捲軸可以捲動的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the horizontal scroll bar can scroll the control.
trans-unit.target: 水平捲軸可以捲動控制項的寬度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: This property only reports a useful value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會報告有用的值如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>小於這個屬性的值，水平捲軸中水平捲動項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>等於或大於此值，在水平捲軸會隱藏。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值不會動態更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，非常有用的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>為主控描繪。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the owner drawn items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are 200 pixels wide, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is 60 pixels wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果的主控描繪項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是 200 像素寬、 但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>為 60 像素寬、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性必須設為 200，若要捲動控制項的可見區域中的項目右邊緣。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性，以顯示顯示中的所有項目文字的水平捲軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性，以確認的項目不會部分顯示的大小因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至表單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a horizontal scroll bar is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出選取水平捲軸是否顯示於控制項中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a horizontal scroll bar in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果水平捲軸顯示於控制項中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> extend beyond the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>屬性會決定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>應該會顯示水平捲軸列時內的項目寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>延伸超過控制項的右邊緣。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，捲軸會自動顯示根據中的項目寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>會描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，才能正確顯示水平捲軸，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性，以顯示顯示中的所有項目文字的水平捲軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性，以確認的項目不會部分顯示的大小因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至表單。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於指定座標處的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> object containing the coordinates used to obtain the item index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 物件，含有用來取得項目索引的座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於指定座標處的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定座標處找到的項目之以零起始的索引，如果找不到相符的項目，則傳回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷哪一個項目位於控制項內特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定哪一個項目清單中的選取使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 游標的位置可以決定，並傳遞至`p`參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法，以判斷其項目使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠上。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您就可以顯示快顯功能表給使用者，以便提供工作和特定的項目為基礎的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that contains items to drop into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行拖放作業使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，其中包含項目並放入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the form sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 將表單的建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A>屬性`true`若要啟用拖放作業在發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to start the drag operation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>開始拖曳作業藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event to determine if an item being dragged into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is a valid data type.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件，以判斷項目拖曳至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是有效的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control at the current cursor location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件執行的拖曳的項目到實際的卸除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項內的目前游標位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件已連接至範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要進行搜尋之目標位置的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要進行搜尋之目標位置的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於指定座標處的項目之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定座標處找到的項目之以零起始的索引，如果找不到相符的項目，則傳回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item that is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷哪一個是在控制項內的特定位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來決定哪一個項目清單中的選取使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `x` and `y` parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 游標的位置可以決定，並傳遞至`x`和`y`參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法，以判斷其項目使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下滑鼠上。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您就可以顯示快顯功能表給使用者，以便提供工作和特定的項目為基礎的功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that contains items to drop into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何執行拖放作業使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，其中包含項目並放入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the form sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 將表單的建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A>屬性`true`若要啟用拖放作業在發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to start the drag operation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>開始拖曳作業藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event to determine if an item being dragged into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is a valid data type.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件，以判斷項目拖曳至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是有效的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control at the current cursor location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件執行的拖曳的項目到實際的卸除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項內的目前游標位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件已連接至範例中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應該重新調整大小以避免僅顯示部分項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項重新調整大小以避免僅顯示部分項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`true`，控制項會自動調整大小以確保不部分顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要維護的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>根據表單的空間需求，將此屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> sizes are such that they show only whole items.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>大小會使其只顯示整個項目。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> to completely fill a docked area, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>完全填滿停駐的區域，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>至`false`。

trans-unit.source: This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這會讓控制項完全填滿區域中，但沒有充分顯示最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不包含任何項目，這個屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The integral height is based on the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, rather than the client area height.
trans-unit.target: 整數類資料的高度為基礎的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是工作區高度。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性設定`true`，項目仍可以部分顯示才顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此屬性沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>屬性，以顯示顯示中的所有項目文字的水平捲軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>屬性，以確認的項目不會部分顯示的大小因<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項，名為`listBox1`，已新增至表單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的項目高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中的項目高度 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`，所有項目具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>屬性會指定加入至每個項目高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由於在主控描繪清單中的每個項目可以有不同的高度，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法來取得中特定項目的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可變高度的項目，這個屬性會傳回第一個項目的高度控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目為 255 的像素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight" /> property was set to less than 0 or more than 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight" /> 屬性設定為小於 0 或超過 255 個像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> representing the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 如需可以執行與項目集合之工作的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別參考主題。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以管理的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property to add items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can view the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>屬性加入項目到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，您可以檢視中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>屬性，但是您無法加入或移除的方法清單中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項資料行中顯示多個項目，可以有多個控制項的清單中選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The code for the example adds 50 items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class and then selects three items from the list using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例程式碼會加入到 50 個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>類別，然後再選取三個項目從清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> collection (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property) and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 然後程式碼會顯示的值從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>集合 (透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>屬性) 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>(透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is located in and called from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要是位於該程式碼，並從呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> is created and the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: 發生於建立主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 和決定清單項目的大小時。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item will be made before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立指定大小的項目都會繪製前的此事件的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，才引發的時機<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum valid height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大有效高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目為 255 的像素。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs.ItemHeight%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs> to a value greater than 255 when handling this event may yield unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs.ItemHeight%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs>大於 255 時處理這個事件可能會產生非預期的結果值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable> and handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> events.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable>和處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ScrollAlwaysVisible%2A> properties and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ScrollAlwaysVisible%2A>屬性，而且使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it in an empty form that imports the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將它貼入中匯入的空白表單<xref:System.Drawing>命名空間和<xref:System.Windows.Forms>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Call `InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeOwnerDrawnListBox`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> control with the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者用滑鼠指標按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> supports multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 是否支援多個資料行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> supports multiple columns; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 支援多個資料行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> places items into as many columns as are needed to make vertical scrolling unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 多重資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目放入才能讓垂直捲動不必要的行。

trans-unit.source: The user can use the keyboard to navigate to columns that are not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以使用鍵盤巡覽至目前看不到的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property to `true` to display a horizontal scroll bar that enables the user to scroll to columns that are not currently shown in the visible region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>屬性`true`顯示水平捲軸，可讓使用者捲動至目前未顯示的可見區域中的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ColumnWidth%2A> property determines the width of each column.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ColumnWidth%2A>屬性決定每個資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a simple two-column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範簡單兩欄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: 多資料行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的高度無法改變。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no matches are found during a search.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜尋中並未找到相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: This constant is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> methods when no matching values are found in a search.
trans-unit.target: 這個常數由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法在搜尋中找到相符的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UICuesEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ChangeUICues" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSourceChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMemberChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem%2A>方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主控描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以執行每個項目至繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制項稱為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要的項目已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 指定何時建立視窗控制代碼，以便設定資料行寬度和其他特性。

trans-unit.target: 繼承類別應該呼叫 <see langword="base.OnHandleCreated" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Overridden to be sure that items are set up and cleared out correctly.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫以確保項目會正確設定並清除。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call <see langword="base.OnHandleDestroyed" />.
trans-unit.target: 繼承控制項應該呼叫 <see langword="base.OnHandleDestroyed" />。
